pr_title: SONARJAVA-3493 Drop ASM, bytecode and x-file related code in profit of hardcoded method behaviors

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3493 Drop asm and bytecode related code
SONARJAVA-3493 Drop asm and bytecode related code
SONARJAVA-3493 Drop asm and bytecode related code
Reduce complexity of test file to let SE engine pass Sanity Check

timeline.bodyText:
You are expected to call toHashCode() here since you are not looking for the HashCode of the builder.
It will not change anything, since they anticipated such confusion and changed the behavior of this method, but it's anyway better to call the right one directly.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/java-frontend/src/main/java/org/sonar/java/se/xproc/MethodBehavior.java b/java-frontend/src/main/java/org/sonar/java/se/xproc/MethodBehavior.java
index d77b8a0c2..1915f9068 100644
--- a/java-frontend/src/main/java/org/sonar/java/se/xproc/MethodBehavior.java
+++ b/java-frontend/src/main/java/org/sonar/java/se/xproc/MethodBehavior.java

@@ -333,7 +333,7 @@ public class MethodBehavior {
 
   @Override
   public int hashCode() {
-    return new HashCodeBuilder(11, 74371)
+    return new HashCodeBuilder(11, 74377)
       .append(signature)
       .append(arity)
       .append(varArgs)

timeline.bodyText:
Constructor states that:

Prime numbers are preferred, especially for the multiplier.

You could use 74377.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

diff --git a/java-frontend/src/main/java/org/sonar/java/se/xproc/MethodBehavior.java b/java-frontend/src/main/java/org/sonar/java/se/xproc/MethodBehavior.java

@@ -333,7 +333,7 @@ public class MethodBehavior {
 
   @Override
   public int hashCode() {
-    return new HashCodeBuilder(11, 74371)
+    return new HashCodeBuilder(11, 74377)
       .append(signature)
       .append(arity)
       .append(varArgs)

timeline.bodyText: You are never using the content of this list.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText:
I did not remember (or was not aware) that we had this property, and I'm glad it's not there anymore!
Should we also consider removing it from peach configuration?
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,7 +244,6 @@ private static void executeBuildWithCommonProperties(Build<?> build, String proj
       .setProperty("dump.old", effectiveDumpOldFolder.resolve(projectName).toString())
       .setProperty("dump.new", FileLocation.of("target/actual/" + projectName).getFile().getAbsolutePath())
       .setProperty("lits.differences", litsDifferencesPath(projectName))
-      .setProperty("sonar.java.xfile", "true")

replies.bodyText: As discussed, we simply stop using it, so it should be OK to let it be there for a while.
replies.author: m-g-sonar
